author: CBC News
title: Peak perfection: Alberta Rockies rise as popular ice climbing destination | CBC News
description: The sport of ice climbing has been around for years but interest in it has grown exponentially in the last decade.
content:
High above the ground in Canmore, Alta., axe-wielding ice climbers are ascending a column of sheer ice that, in other seasons, is a waterfall.
